department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada, has a requirement for the supply of bread and rolls on an as and when requested basis.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Request for Stand Alone Offer for Fresh Bread and Rolls

**Reference Number** - WS3835602610
**Solicitation Number** - WS3835602610
**Publication Date** - February 2, 2023
**Tender Closing Date** - February 23, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has issued a Request for Stand Alone Offer (RSAO) for the supply of fresh bread and rolls on an as-and-when requested basis to various cooking facilities and vessels located in regional areas across Newfoundland and Labrador and Nova Scotia.

The successful bidder will be awarded a one-year contract to deliver the following products:
* Fresh bread
* Rolls
Delivery zones cover various locations in both regions, including static kitchens and military vessels.

Eligible bidders are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically through SAP Ariba online tendering platform.

Important Details:
* Trade Agreements: The contract is open to bidders that are compliant under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Regions of Opportunity: Newfoundland and Labrador and Nova Scotia.
* Regions of Delivery: Same as above.
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer.

The relevant solicitation document is available online on the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302828. Interested bidders are required to access this information before initiating the bid submission process.

To be entrusted with this contract, the successful bidder must demonstrate a strong capacity to manage timely delivery of the products to the destinations mentioned above.

Respondents are expected to meet the minimum criteria of providing quality services and reasonable rates as per the minimum requirements outlined in the solicitation document. Tenders will be evaluated based on price and it is expected that the lowest bidder will win.

For further information regarding the tender and procedures to submit a proposal, please contact:
Tara Sheppard
Buyer
Public Services and Procurement Canada
Email: tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: This announcement is no longer valid as it has already passed the tender closing date. Please refer to the official government procurement website for active opportunities.
